title: Task to track documentation and tutorials
body_html:
Tutorials:
Basic:

  • 60 minute blitz
  • Language modeling with RNN, no preprocessing
  • An introduction to reinforcement learning with torch and gym
  • Writing your own neural network module in python
  • Writing your own neural network module in C (CFFI)
  • Writing a neural network package (like nnx)
  • Clean up the RL tutorial

Intermediate:

  • Model Parallel / Pipeline Parallel RNNs
  • Hooks / Learning to Learn
  • Multiprocessing: Self-play RL agent

Reference Docs:

  • torch ( #350 )
  • autograd ( #368 )
  • optim ( #368 )
  • nn
  • multiprocessing
  • utils

body:
Tutorials:
Basic:
- [ ] 60 minute blitz
- [ ] Language modeling with RNN, no preprocessing
- [ ] An introduction to reinforcement learning with torch and gym
- Writing your own neural network module in python
- Writing your own neural network module in C (CFFI)
- Writing a neural network package (like nnx)
- Clean up the RL tutorial

Intermediate:
- [ ] Model Parallel / Pipeline Parallel RNNs
- [ ] Hooks / Learning to Learn
- [ ] Multiprocessing: Self-play RL agent

Reference Docs:
- [ ] torch ( https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/350 )
- [ ] autograd ( https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/368 )
- [ ] optim ( https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/368 )
- [x] nn
- [x] multiprocessing
- [ ] utils
